job_history.work_description: Make an investigation to determine the facts, the needs of the child/individual. Find available resources within the family and community to meet those needs. To facilitate, when appropriate, the settlement of disputed issues. To offer evidence and examine witnesses at adjudication. To explore options with the court at dispositional hearing. To protect and promote the best interests of the child/individual until officially relieved of the responsibility by the court.
Managed entire function of the store. Counting all inventory and stock. Customer Service, ordering products. Take care of general maintenance of the store.
Responsible for completing issues-set up tax lines and escrow. Registered new loan numbers in LINK system. Assisted Audit department with legal documentation.

skills.name: Advocacy
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience as a Volunteer Advocate, handling investigations, facilitating settlements, and protecting the best interests of children/individuals, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Case Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing cases as a Volunteer Advocate, including finding resources and facilitating settlements, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience providing customer service as a Sales Clerk, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing inventory as a Sales Clerk, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Loan Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience as a Loan Review Support Specialist, including setting up tax lines and escrow, and assisting with legal documentation, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Has experience with data entry as a Loan Review Support Specialist, including registering new loan numbers in the LINK system, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience managing the entire function of a store as a Sales Clerk, but the duration was short, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Counseling
skills.explanation: Has education in Counseling, but no direct experience mentioned, showing basic familiarity.

skills.name: Healthcare Administration
skills.explanation: Has education in Healthcare Administration, but no direct experience mentioned, showing basic familiarity.
